name: Couches HODL
description:
A/D to move. 

Stretch your limbs out and navigate your couch through Shillville. Make sure to collect those tasty hamburgers that couches love so much. But avoid the traffic cones!

This is a meme-tier game made for the Couch Meme NFT gang. Check them out over at https://www.ourcouch.xyz/ and pick yourself up some couches.

V2.0 - 09/21/2021

* Smoothed out the difficulty curve

* Fixed a couple bugs that made impassable road sections
